com.sailthru.mobile.sdk

Class NotificationExtender

  • com.sailthru.mobile.sdk.NotificationExtender

  • public class NotificationExtender

    Styles a standard Sailthru Mobile Notification, optionally with a given Message.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NotificationExtender

        public NotificationExtender()

        Styles a standard Sailthru Mobile Notification, optionally with a given Message.

public NotificationExtender setMessage(@Nullable
                                                 Message message)

        Sets the Message to format the notification with.

        this NotificationExtender for chaining.
